title: [Nethermind Restart] On restart which is NOT graceful (power outage) peers db contains malformed data
body:
**Description**
According to report by discord user:
"It looks like my client suddenly stopped working (it had previously been running fine on the latest version)."

From logs most important things are:
1. Node was working fine before restart
2. Suddenly node restarted (no dispose logs)
3. After restart exception:
```
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]: 2023-05-15 14:14:53.1194|Unable to init the peer manager. System.IO.InvalidDataException: Malformed data
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Db.SimpleFilePublicKeyDb.<LoadData>g__ThrowInvalidDataException|36_1()
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Db.SimpleFilePublicKeyDb.LoadData()
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Db.SimpleFilePublicKeyDb..ctor(String name, String dbDirectoryPath, ILogManager logManager)
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Init.Steps.InitializeNetwork.InitPeer()
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]: 2023-05-15 14:14:53.1376|Step InitializeNetwork        failed after 197ms System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Init.Steps.InitializeNetwork.Initialize(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Init.Steps.InitializeNetwork.Execute(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Nethermind.Runner[2402093]:    at Nethermind.Init.Steps.EthereumStepsManager.ExecuteStep(IStep step, StepInfo stepInfo, CancellationToken cancellationToken)

```

Some more logs:
[NethermindLogs_5-13_and_5-15.zip](https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/files/11481827/NethermindLogs_5-13_and_5-15.zip)
